Tax Revisions 
Personal and Corporate Income Tax
01 January 2020 
- 
Personal income tax rates were revised to 6 per cent, 12 per cent and 18 per cent 
from 4 per cent, 8 per cent, 12 per cent, 16 per cent, 20 per cent and 24 per cent. 
The tax free threshold was increased to Rs. 3 million per annum for any income from 
Rs. 1.2 million per annum for employment income and Rs. 500,000 per annum for 
personal income. Further, income tax slabs were increased to Rs. 3 million per annum 
from Rs. 600,000 per annum.
 
- 
Corporate income tax rates were revised as follows with effect from 01 January 2020:
- 
standard corporate income tax rate was reduced to 24 per cent from 28 per cent
- 
corporate income tax rate applicable for the construction industry was reduced to 
14 per cent from 28 per cent
- 
corporate income tax rate applicable for the manufacturing industry was revised 
to 18 per cent
